original_text: They put the Covenant Box on a new cart. They took it out of Abinadab's house which was on the hill. Abinadab's sons, Uzzah and Ahio, were leading the new cart 4 which had the Covenant Box on it. Ahio walked in front of the Covenant Box.
korean_text: 그들이 하나님의 궤를 새 수레에 싣고 산에 있는 아비나답의 집에서 나오는데 아비나답의 아들 웃사와 아효가 그 새 수레를 모니라

sentences.original_text: They put the Covenant Box on a new cart
They took it out of Abinadab's house
Abinadab's sons, Uzzah and Ahio, were leading the new cart
sentences.korean_translation: 아비나답의 아들들인 웃사와 아히오가 새 수레를 이끌고 있었다

sentences.original_text: which had the Covenant Box on it
Ahio walked in front of the Covenant Box
